description.value: This house is good enough to eat. Just come visit it to see how that deal smells good. No trap here !

contact.value: Very old witch (she would be very happy to make you visit her house).

description.value: This castle is a picture of joy of living. This is a real charming place, especially on night. It may bite into your financials, but it worths the price.
In a very quiet area in a far suburb, this nice place is dedicated to peace and rest. You will never be awake by neighbours...

contact.value: Sleeping Beauty (if not available, please leave a message)

description.value: One very spacious and richly fitted room, this place provides all the stuff you need. This real estate should be kept secret.

contact.value: The owner is a silly guy as he sometimes says he doesn't want to sell this house. Please call the agency directly.

description.value: This new concept of environment-friendly and very robust house will seduce you with its cheapest price.
Hold your breath : this middle price house is all made of wood ! Dont let this opportunity be blown away!
You can buy this house a pig in a poke : built in a rock, it is also very comfortable and even provides a big chimney for long winter evenings.
